mapper.select: select s.id, s.color, s.label from user u, personal_okr p, okr_core o, fourth_quadrant f, status_flag s where o.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0 and o.is_deleted = 0 and f.is_deleted = 0 and s.is_deleted = 0 and o.is_over = 0 and u.id = p.user_id and o.id = p.core_id and f.core_id = o.id and s.fourth_quadrant_id = f.id and u.id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select s.id, s.color, s.label from fourth_quadrant f, status_flag s where f.is_deleted = 0 and s.is_deleted = 0 and s.fourth_quadrant_id = f.id and f.id = #{quadrantId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
